value.title: How can I get started with Azure Private Link | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this video of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn what Azure Private Link is and how you can get started with it.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips  Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure: http://azure.com/free

value.title: How do Power Apps differ from Azure Logic Apps? | One Dev Question: Dona Sarkar
value.excerpt: Ever wondered the difference between Power Apps and Azure Logic Apps? In the One Dev Question series, Principal Cloud Advocate Dona Sarkar explains just how different they are.    For more information, visit: https://docs.microsoft.com/powerapps/powerapps-overview/?WT.mc_id=onedevquestion-c9-donasa

value.title: How to add Azure Alerts as push notifications on your phone | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: The Azure mobile app allows you to receive Azure Alerts as push notifications on your mobile device. In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn how you can setup Azure Alerts such as metric alerts, log analytics, Application Insights, and Activity Log from Azure Monitor on the Azure portal.

value.title: How to build a CI/CD pipeline for API Management, Part 2 | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Miao Jiang joins Scott Hanselman to demonstrate a sample CI/CD pipeline implemented using Azure DevOps and Azure API Management DevOps resource kit. value.title: How to build tabs and alerts in Azure workbooks | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In workbooks, you can build complex reports but may need a way to segment information in different sections. value.title: How to use Azure Orbital to communicate with your satellites | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure Orbital is a fully managed cloud-based ground station as a service that enables you to communicate with your spacecraft or satellite constellations, downlink and uplink data, process your data in the cloud, chain services with Azure services in unique scenarios, and generate products for your customers.
